code: import{heroes}from"../data/heroes";export var getHeroesByPublisher=function getHeroesByPublisher(publisher){var validPublisher=['DC Comics','Marvel Comics','all'];if(!validPublisher.includes(publisher)){throw new Error("".concat(publisher," is not a valid publisher"));}return publisher==='all'?heroes:heroes.filter(function(hero){return hero.publisher===publisher;});};
